trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the instinct is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The instinct makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Deflect Blow
entries: In response to being hit by a melee attack roll, the instinct partially deflects the blow. The damage the instinct takes from the attack is reduced by {@dice 1d6}.
